title: My father thinks I'm a freak
body:
http://i.imgur.com/NDZWxYt.png[/img]

Funny because you see, I was searching in google to find images of an anime "rakudai kishi no cavalry stella" to do an old people rant(I'm as old as the first hunter in bloodborne) I want to say that nowadays I feel the anime writers make anime cater towards the younger demographic.

Anyway my father thinks I'm a freak now, because he saw a whole google page of rakudai kishi no cavalry stella search.
Thanks a lot
